Package eg.utils

Class LinesFinder

java.lang.Object
eg.utils.LinesFinder
public class LinesFinder
extends java.lang.Object
Static methods to search for lines and line parameters

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    LinesFinder()  

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    static boolean isMultiline​(java.lang.String text)
    Returns if the specified text contains at least one newline character
    static int lastNewline​(java.lang.String text, int pos)
    Returns the position of the last newline before the specified position even if a newline is found at the position
    static java.lang.String line​(java.lang.String text, int lastNewline)
    Returns the content of the line that follows lastNewline
    static java.lang.String lineAtPos​(java.lang.String text, int pos)
    Returns the content of the line that contains the specified position
    static int lineCount​(java.lang.String text)
    Returns the count of lines in the specified text
    static int lineNrAtPos​(java.lang.String text, int pos)
    Returns the number of the line that contains the specified position
    static java.lang.String lines​(java.lang.String text, int lastNewline, int length)
    Returns the possibly multiline content that follows lastNewline
    static int nextNewline​(java.lang.String text, int pos)
    Returns the position of the next newline behind the specified position

    • lines

      public static java.lang.String lines​(java.lang.String text, int lastNewline, int length)
      Returns the possibly multiline content that follows lastNewline
      Parameters:
      text - the text
      lastNewline - the position of the last newline
      length - the length of the section that is contained in the line or lines
      Returns:
      the line or lines
      See Also:
      lastNewline(java.lang.String, int)

    • lastNewline

      public static int lastNewline​(java.lang.String text, int pos)
      Returns the position of the last newline before the specified position even if a newline is found at the position
      Parameters:
      text - the text
      pos - the position
      Returns:
      the last newline position, -1 if the line is the first line

    • nextNewline

      public static int nextNewline​(java.lang.String text, int pos)
      Returns the position of the next newline behind the specified position
      Parameters:
      text - the text
      pos - the position relative to which the next newline is searched
      Returns:
      the position of the next newline character. The length of text if no newline character is found

    • lineNrAtPos

      public static int lineNrAtPos​(java.lang.String text, int pos)
      Returns the number of the line that contains the specified position
      Parameters:
      text - the text
      pos - the position
      Returns:
      the number

      Returns the count of lines in the specified text
      Parameters:
      text - the text
      Returns:
      the line number

    • isMultiline

      public static boolean isMultiline​(java.lang.String text)
      Returns if the specified text contains at least one newline character
      Parameters:
      text - the text
      Returns:
      the boolean value; true if multiline
